data.quote: As a man thinketh in his heart, so shall he be.
data.author: James Allen

data.quote: Who you are is defined by what you’re willing to struggle for.
data.author: Mark Manson

data.quote: Life is essentially an endless series of problems. The solution to one problem is merely the creation of another.
data.author: Mark Manson

data.quote: Don’t just sit there. Do something. The answers will follow.
data.author: Mark Manson

data.quote: The more something threatens your identity, the more you will avoid it.
data.author: Mark Manson
